display_name: Edinburgh Postnatal Depression Scale (EPDS): Total score
description:
Summary score from the Edinburgh Postnatal Depression Scale (EPDS) [Schaper et al. (PMID: 7996526)](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/7996526/)

[Search for all EPDS variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/shine/variables?search=epds)
